name: DialogTrigger
description:
A button that opens the dialog.
Renders a `<button>` element.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the componentâ€™s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the default HTML element that the component
renders with another element, or compose it with another component.
Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-modal.description: Present when the corresponding dialog is modal.

data-popup-open.description: Present when the corresponding dialog is open.
